PrecisOrder exempting 19 provincial government employees involved in the administration of the FIREARMS CONTROL PROGRAM from the application of a number of provisions in the Public Service Employment Act upon their recruitment by the ROYAL CANADIAN MOUNTED POLICE, effective May 1, 1998.
